title: My game ended but game says its still in prograss
body:
I played a game with trist and the enemy surr at 20. I finished and skipped waiting for stats. I tried to play another game but it kept saying that my game was still in progress. I logged of and tried to log back in. Now it is saying that the game crashed and that the game is still playing even though it ended with them surrendering. Help PLEASE. I cant play any more LoL because of this.
Thanks
Minpin

replies.body: I wasnt playing ranked (norms). Does it still affect?
